comments:
Build 20030715

While editing in Java editor, following file:
[public class X {
	
	void foo(String s) {
		
		if (s instanceof String) { // unnecessary check
			bar((String) s);                // identity cast
			bar((Object) s);               // necessary widening
		}
	}
	
	void bar(Object o) {}
	void bar (String s) {}
}]

With new diagnosis enabled for unnecessary type checks, I tried to see what 
quickfix would do for these. Editor became locked after that point (any further 
attempt to press a key is dumping another similar trace in the log).
